TutoExplainContent: Welcome to Planets Activity! It provides a 3D model of planets for you to explore
TutoPlanetImageContent: Click each planet to know more about it
TutoPositionButtonContent: Click here to switch to planet position view
TutoExploreOverviewContent: In this view, you can explore and know more about the planet.
TutoInfoButtonContent: Click here to toggle the planet info
TutoRotateButtonContent: Click here to stop or start the rotation of the planet
TutoImageButtonContent: Click here to save the current planet image to your journal, where you can use it for other activites
TutoPlanetInfoContent: Here are the informations about the planet
TutoPlanetDisplayContent: This is the 3D model of the planet. Click to drag the planet and scroll to zoom in and out
TutoPositionOverviewContent: In this view, you can see where the planets are positioned in the Solar System
TutoPlanetPositionContent: Here, you can see the positions of the planet in the Solar System, their size comparison, and their distance from the sun in kilometers
TutoListButtonContent: Click here to switch to planets list view
